overview:
Marcia Currie brings more than 20 years experience to TinyMassive, primarily with Cox Enterprises. She was a senior financial executive at multiple Cox companies including Cox Communications, Inc., AutoTrader.com and multiple technology joint ventures. Her skills include .NET, business development, analysis, mergers and acquisitions and financial planning. Previously, Marcia was a CPA with Ernst & Young in New Orleans.

As CFO at TinyMassive.com, Marcia is responsible for repairing broken financial models, writing checks and saying ‘EBITDA’ alot. She proudly attended Louisiana State University in Baton Rouge, LA but never agreed with their choice of school colors. When Marcia secures her candidacy, her first order of business in the White House will be forcing LSU to wear orange because it is the new black.
